categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Army (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Guard Squadron was a walker-equipped squadron of the Sith Empire active during 3637 BBY. Following the Battle of Rishi during the Revanite crisis the squadron was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan. Guard Squadron Walkers guarded the encampments established by the Empire in the area between the Coalition Command Post and the Temple of Sacrifice.
Guard Squadron Walkers appear in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion as Champion Guard units for the Imperial camps on Yavin 4.
